name: Magmortar
description: The Blast Pokémon. It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees F from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: The flames from this Pokémon's body shine dim light in a 15 ft radius. In addition, when hit by a melee attack, roll a d10. On a 10, the attacker is burned.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be put to sleep.
